title: StrutStyle
description: Defines the strut of a text line.

debugLabel.description: A label to help identify this strut style.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for this strut style.

fontFamilyFallback.description: A list of fallback font families to use for this strut style.

fontSize.description: The font size to use for this strut style.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for this strut style.

forceStrutHeight.description: Whether to force the strut height.

height.description: The minimum height of the strut.

leading.description: The additional leading of the strut which is a multiple of fontSize.
